title: Ticket #4824: Should DIR for splices work the same as for sub-DAGs?
description:
See today's (2015-01-12) emails from Brian Candler on ht-condor-users. Anyhow, he reports that DIR on a splice requires that all output and error files still need to be given relative to the top-level directory.

In general, I think that splices and sub-DAGs should work as similarly as possible, so DIR on a splice should probably essentially add a DIR specification to every node in the splice.
